text:
Instruqt | The Netherlands (Hilversum) | Marketing role | Full-time | https://instruqt.com

Instruqt makes learning of technology more fun. By solving hands-on challenges on real infrastructure, we teach developers in Cloud, DevOps and Data. With the Engine, companies can add their own (private) content as well.

The team is growing, and we need more marketing power. If you have affinity with IT and learning, and have experience in in-bound, worldwide marketing, we should meet.

Contact me at bas[at]instruqt.com. We have good coffee in Hilversum!
